channel.title: It wont let me open .cfg and .class files in my server source folder
channel.description:
when i try to open those folders (ex: item.class or npc [which doesnt have .cfg next to npc]) in my source folder (testscape) it comes up with a pop up saying:
Windows cannot open this file:
file: NPCList.class (this is example)
To open this file windows needs to know what program created it (this is what gets me and i dont know where to get the program). windows can go online to look it up automatically (i tried that, but it just has a tutorial on how to use it and no download), or you can manually select from a list of programs on your computer.
what do you want to do?
-use the web service to find the appropriate program -select program from a list
------------------------------------------------
for .cfg, it says this:
you are attempting to open a file of type 'microsoft office outlook configuration file' (.cfg)
these files are used by the operating system and by various programs. editing or modifying them could damage your system.
if you still want to open the file, click open with, otherwise, click cancel. (then i click open with and it comes up with the same pop up as the .class file does)
---------
omg??? :confused: :confused: :confused: this is annoying me

item.title: It wont let me open .cfg and .class files in my server source folder
item.dc:creator: @trackerofdeath4500 trackerofdeath4500
item.description:
@trackerofdeath4500 wrote:

Easy Look For The Notepad Thing’s And Edit There… Class’s Are For The Computer To Be Able To Read YOur Coding. To Edit That Use Client.Java. And Open The Cfg’s With Notepad
